item.title: Big Data Architectures: An Introduction to Big Data
item.description: Posts in the Big Data Architectures Series An Introduction to Big Data What is Big Data? Big Data is defined by Wikipedia as, “Data that usually includes data sets with sizes beyond the ability of commonly used software tools to capture, curate, manage, and process data within a tolerable elapsed time.” In simpler terms, huge amounts of data that cannot be handled using a traditional database system is called as big data.
